channel.title: Zoohio on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Zoohio on ZooBerry

item.title: Concrete Jungle Save File
item.description: This is the latest City Zoo from my show and tell. All the exhibits are complete with food, enrichment and shelters.

item.title: Emerald Grove Save File
item.description: This zoo is made on a large city map and has spacious exhibits and room for all the latest animal downloads. All the exhibits have shelters, food and enrichment. I have included a food court and five restaurants.

item.title: Eagle's View Template Map
item.description: I wanted to create a map with a waterfall as the focal point when entering the zoo.

item.title: Hastick Woods Template Map
item.description: This map has several waterfalls nestled through wooded areas. Also features two reflecting pools at the entrance and was designed on a large map.
